name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open link in new discarded tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds 'Open link in new discarded tab' option

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to open links in a new unloaded tab. Tab icons created by codefisher - Flaticon
